subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa left her pursuers in the desert dust to successfully defend her title at the Safeway International with a seven-stroke victory in Superstition Mountain, Ariz. With three big flags from her native Mexico waving in the crowd, she shot a six-under 66 to finish at 22-under 266. It was her second win in three attempts this season and her 19th career victory.
